DOC.brief_summary: Abstract Objectives : To explore clinical effect self-acupressure treat insomnia deliver training course . Hypothesis : Subjects participate self-acupressure training course great improvement insomnia symptom daytime impairment sleep hygiene education control group 4 8 week . Design subject : A pilot randomize control trial . Subjects insomnia recruit community . 30 subject randomize self-acupressure sleep hygiene education control group 1 : 1 ratio . Study instrument : Insomnia Severity Index ( ISI ) use assess insomnia symptom daytime impairment . Interventions : Subjects self-acupressure group attend two training session learn self-acupressure practice self-acupressure every night 4 week ; subject sleep hygiene education control group receive two training session learn sleep hygiene practice . Main outcome measure : The primary outcome measure ISI score . Other measure include sleep parameter use subjective sleep diary , Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale , SF-6D 4 8 week . Acceptability sustainability self-acupressure also evaluate . Data Analysis : Differences questionnaire score , subjective sleep parameter examine use mixed-effects model .
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) Chinese Hong Kong resident able communicate Cantonese Putonghua ; ( 2 ) Aged 18 65 year ; ( 3 ) A current clinical Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fifth edition ( DSM5 ) diagnosis insomnia disorder accord Brief Insomnia Questionnaire ( BIQ ) , validate diagnostic tool . ( The criterion include difficulty fall asleep , difficulty stay asleep , early morning awaken clinically significant consequence daily life least 3 month . ) ( 4 ) Insomnia Severity Index total score least 10 indicate insomnia clinical level ; ( 5 ) Willing give inform consent comply trial protocol . ( 1 ) Receiving acupuncture practitionerdelivered acupressure treatment past 6 month ; ( 2 ) Pregnancy ; ( 3 ) Cognitive impairment indicate Mini Mental State Examination ≤ 23 ; ( 4 ) At significant suicidal risk rat Hamilton Depression Rating Scale item suicide ( score ≥ 3 ) ; ( 5 ) No comorbid sleep disorder primarily require treatment , sleep apnea narcolepsy ; ( 6 ) Taking herbal remedy , overthecounter medication , psychotropic drug target insomnia within 2 week prior baseline .
